Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.development

Class MutableProduction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.development.Production
it.polimi.ingsw.model.development.MutableProduction
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus
public class MutableProduction extends Production implements HasStatus
The MutableProduction class represents the mutable production mechanism of the game, where the player can choose the input and the output of the production.

  • Constructor Details

    • MutableProduction

      public MutableProduction​(SupplyContainer in, SupplyContainer out, int dimInput, int dimOutput)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      in - is a SupplyContainer which contains the supplies needed as fixed input
      out - is a SupplyContainer which contains the supplies produced as fixed output when the production is triggered
      dimInput - is the maximum size of the input (fixed + mutable)
      dimOutput - is the maximum dimension of the output (fixed + mutable)

    • MutableProduction

      public MutableProduction​(int dimInput, int dimOutput)
      Creates an object without any fixed input and output.
      Parameters:
      dimInput - is the maximum size of the input (mutable)
      dimOutput - is the maximum dimension of the output (mutable)

  • Method Details

    • getInput

      public SupplyContainer getInput()
      Gets the mutable input of the MutableProduction
      Overrides:
      getInput in class Production
      Returns:
      the SupplyContainer containing the input

    • produce

      public SupplyContainer produce()
      Activates the production. If the total input (fixed + mutable) equals the current supply store, then the current supply store is wiped and the total output (fixed + mutable) is returned. If not a fatal error is produced and the program is terminated.
      Overrides:
      produce in class Production
      Returns:
      A SupplyContainer containing the total output (fixed + mutable)

    • check

      public void check() throws SupplyException
      Verifies if the current supplies present in the production depot are the same as the total input (fixed + mutable) supplies.
      Overrides:
      check in class Production
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The current supplies present in the production depot are not the same as the total input (fixed + mutable) supplies.

    • swapInput

      public void swapInput​(int num, WarehouseObjectType newInput) throws SupplyException
      Substitutes the current supply present in the specified input slot with the supply given as argument.
      Parameters:
      num - Slot
      newInput - New supply type to add (cannot be FAITH_MARKER or NO_TYPE)
      Throws:
      SupplyException

    • swapOutput

      public void swapOutput​(int num, WarehouseObjectType newOutput) throws SupplyException
      Substitutes the current supply present in the specified output slot with the supply given as argument.
      Parameters:
      num - Slot
      newOutput - New supply type to add (cannot be FAITH_MARKER or NO_TYPE)
      Throws:
      SupplyException

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStatus()
      Allows to receive the status of every object which implements this interface in the form of an ArrayList of Integer
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
